metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45311 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: fsevents before 1.2.11 depends on the https://fsevents-binaries.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com URL, which might allow an adversary to execute arbitrary code if any JavaScript project (that depends on fsevents) distributes code that was obtained from that URL at a time when it was controlled by an adversary.

notes.Note: ccdm94> qtwebengine-opensource-src and npm contain embedded copies of fsevents.

criterions.comment: npm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
